title: 🚨 Lawmakers Urge Biden & SCOTUS to Extend TikTok Ban Deadline 🚨
description: Lawmakers are pressing President Biden and the Supreme Court to extend the looming deadline for the TikTok ban, citing concerns over its immediate impacts on millions of users and businesses relying on the platform. This development intensifies the ongoing debate surrounding national security, free speech, and economic repercussions. Stay informed on this evolving situation that affects creators and viewers alike.

title: 🚨 Infinitum_US: Official Favorited Agency Partner 🚨
description: Infinitum_US is proud to be recognized as an Official Favorited Agency Partner as well as a TikTok LIVE Creator Network. This distinguished title highlights our commitment to excellence in managing and supporting creators. As a trusted partner, we empower our creators with the tools, resources, and guidance needed to succeed, offering unmatched opportunities for growth and collaboration within the platform. Our agency's dedication to fostering creativity and innovation has earned us this esteemed status, making Infinitum_US a top choice for creators worldwide. 🌟 APPLY NOW!

title: 🚨 TikTok Ban Update (1/12/2025) 🚨
description: 🔥 Valuable news regarding the potential 'TikTok Ban'—stay tuned for vital information and next steps. Here is what no one is talking about or telling us.📣

title: 🚨 Important Announcement - TikTok Ban Updates
description:
ONLY IF THE BAN TAKES PLACE ON JAN 19th 2025 in the USA 1. We would recommend using a VPN and make sure to set it to CANADA to access TikTok and our network until further action is taken. This will allow you to continue using the app. Be sure to share this information with your viewers.

2. Using a VPN bypasses restrictions until the ban is reversed. (TikTok LTD is an American company, albeit owned by ByteDance, a Chinese entity, making a permanent ban unlikely.)

Recommended VPNs: Visit here for a list of top VPNs:

title: SCOTUS Debate on TikTok - Watch it LIVE
description: Watch the Supreme Court hears TikTok ban, oral arguments

title: SCOTUS Votes on TikTok Ban set for 1/19/2025 Tomorrow
description: ⏰ The clock is ticking for TikTok, a beloved platform used by millions. On Friday, TikTok will stand before the Supreme Court in a crucial fight against the looming ban unless they sever ties with China. We at Infinitum_US remain hopeful for a positive outcome and stand in support of our community. 💖✨

title: Pray for The west coast
description: 🙏 Let’s unite our hearts and keep everyone on the West Coast in our thoughts as they face devastating fires—our fellow creators, communities, and even TikTok’s LA headquarters are all in need of compassion and support. We’re standing with you in spirit, hoping for safety and relief. ❤️‍🔥✨
